mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BookRental ( rentalCode, rentalUserId, rentalBookCode, rentalStartDate, rentalEndDate, rentalExtension ) VALUES ( #{rentalCode}, #{rentalUserId}, #{rentalBookCode}, #{rentalStartDate}, #{rentalEndDate}, #{rentalExtension} )
mapper.select: SELECT b.bookName, b.bookAuthor, b.bookPublisher, br.rentalEndDate, br.rentalStartDate FROM BookRental br JOIN Book b ON br.rentalBookCode = b.BookCode WHERE br.rentalUserId = #{rentalUserId};
mapper.delete: DELETE br FROM BookRental br JOIN Book b ON br.rentalBookCode = b.bookCode WHERE br.rentalUserId = #{userId} AND b.bookName = #{bookName};
